description:
WordPress has become the most powerful platform today to build websites. On date, over 60 million websites all across the world use WordPress, which started off as a simple blogging platform. The simplicity and ease of use are the primary reasons for the rapid adoption of the platform.

In our course, we are going to learn WordPress in the most systematic manner, starting from the basics of domain and hosting to the more advanced features of WordPress. The course is worded in neutral English accent, easily understandable by all.

The course should ideally be completed in a day or so, and once completed, you will be able to build your own WordPress website in under 90 minutes! I assure you a thorough learning experience and would be available 24/7 to answer your queries and doubts. So why wait, let's begin!
title: WordPress 2016 for Beginners : Build awesome websites!
